content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hello!!

Using the style of reforming by shaping observed details into a story can greatly enhance the creative process, as it allows for a deeper exploration of the themes and emotions represented in the droodle. This narrative approach not only provides context but can also inspire more imaginative and poignant captions that resonate with the essence of the drawing.
